ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Simple mechanisms for defining and interpreting package options. Provides helpers for interpreting environment variables, global options, defining default values and more.
Simple mechanisms for defining and interpreting package options. Provides helpers for interpreting environment variables, global options, defining default values and more.

name: r-options
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.3.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-options
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/options_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/options/options_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 41b4aad4c68dbc0c83f1a644fef1ef10f1bf7bdfed0d3d3c7eb8d33b06f11dd8

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('options')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('options')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://dgkf.github.io/options/, https://codeberg.org/dgkf/options
  license: MIT
  summary: Simple mechanisms for defining and interpreting package options. Provides helpers
    for interpreting environment variables, global options, defining default values
    and more.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - mfakaehler

# Package: options
# Title: Simple, Consistent Package Options
# Version: 0.3.1
# Authors@R: person( "Doug", "Kelkhoff", email = "doug.kelkhoff@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre") )
# Description: Simple mechanisms for defining and interpreting package options. Provides helpers for interpreting environment variables, global options, defining default values and more.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# URL: https://dgkf.github.io/options/, https://codeberg.org/dgkf/options
# BugReports: https://codeberg.org/dgkf/options/issues
# Imports: utils
# Suggests: crayon, knitr, rmarkdown, roxygen2, rcmdcheck, pkgload, withr, testthat (>= 3.0.0)
# Config/Needs/website: pkgdown
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Encoding: UTF-8
# RoxygenNote: 7.3.2
# Config/testthat/edition: 3
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2025-03-29 20:18:02 UTC; root
# Author: Doug Kelkhoff [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Doug Kelkhoff <doug.kelkhoff@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2025-03-29 20:40:02 UTC
